description: The Nanto Goshasei (South Dipper Five Chariot Stars) are the sworn guardians of Yuria, the Last Nanto General. The stars of Goshasei correspond to the constellation Auriga, the Charioteer and each of the five members represent the following elements: Wind, Cloud, Fire, Mountain, and Sea. Each of the Goshasei confront Raou during the story.
name: Nanto Goshasei
